com.lohika.alp.reporter
Class Log4jConfigurer

java.lang.Object
  com.lohika.alp.reporter.Log4jConfigurer

public class Log4jConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object

Configures Log4j programmatically to use XMLLayout and TestFileAppender, if they aren't already configured in log4j.properties

Configures all ObjectRenderer implementations for com.lohika.alp.log.elements package
